metadata.title: CVE-2020-24654 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In KDE Ark before 20.08.1, a crafted TAR archive with symlinks can installfiles outside the extraction directory, as demonstrated by a writeoperation to a user's home directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ark - 4:17.12.3-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ark package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:17.12.3-0ubuntu1.2').
